description: Ultrasoft and lightweight, our take on cotton French terry is washed for a perfectly broken-in look and feel.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 31" body length (front and back), a 58" chest, and a 37" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 33" body length (front and back), a 58" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
